name: Breakers
author: UpdatingStatusOnGoingTypeManhwa
content: Joo In-gong was dragged into the remake of a game he was playing called &ltKnight Saga:Re&gt.However, something wasn&#039t right. The only playable characters should be Loch of the human side and Zephyr of the demon side. Instead, he awakens in the body of Shutra— the ninth prince of the Demon Realm, a character who actually didn&#039t exist in the game’s story.Granted two mysterious powers, &quotProtagonist Setting Adjustment&quot and &quotPower of Conquest,&quot Joo In-gong now must alter the
